name: hybridevel
description:
This plugin provides lots of functions for hybrid project. Each function has 
the shortcut and the Ex command.

Now the plugin supports the following projects: c,c++,java,make,ant,
flash, and matlab are listed in the $VIMRUNTIME/development directory. You
can write scripts such as python.vim to support other projects.

versions.release_notes:
Its dependent plugin shellinsidevim.vim has been combined in this plugin.
So you can execute shell command directly with ex command :Shell,
and the output will display in the quickfix window.

BTW, if the shell command is a compiler that your vim supports, the compiler will be sourced.
